description: This file defines API routes for managing restaurant entities in a food delivery management system using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for creating, listing, and fetching restaurants by ID, interacting with a database via SQLAlchemy models.

methods.name: RestaurantRead create_restaurant(payload: RestaurantCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new restaurant in the database using data from the payload.

methods.name: list[RestaurantRead] list_restaurants( is_active: bool | None = Query(default=None, description="If provided, filter by active status."), limit: int = Query(default=50, ge=1, le=200, description="Max number of results."), offset: int = Query(default=0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination."), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Retrieves a list of restaurants from the database, with optional filtering by active status and pagination.

methods.name: RestaurantRead get_restaurant(restaurant_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Fetches a restaurant by its ID from the database.

ctags.name: create_restaurant
ctags.pattern: /^def create_restaurant(payload: RestaurantCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> RestaurantRea/

ctags.name: get_restaurant
ctags.pattern: /^def get_restaurant(restaurant_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> RestaurantRead:$/

ctags.name: list_restaurants
ctags.signature: ( is_active: bool | None = Query(default=None, description="If provided, filter by active status."), limit: int = Query(default=50, ge=1, le=200, description="Max number of results."), offset: int = Query(default=0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination."), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
